source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT    AccountGUID AS AccountID  ,CompanyName AS AccountName  ,AccountID AS AccountNumber  ,PrimarySegment AS EndCustomerSegment  ,PrimarySubSegment AS EndCustomerSubsegment  ,Industry  ,Vertical AS industryVertical  ,PrimaryAddress1 AS Line1  ,PrimaryAddress2 AS Line2  ,PrimaryAddress3 AS Line3  ,ManagedStatus   ,MSSalesID  ,MSSalesTopParentID  ,NumberOfEmployees  ,OEMManaged  ,oemorganizationtype  ,oemsegmenttype  ,ParentAccountGUID AS ParentAccountID  ,ParentingLevel  ,PcCount  ,Status  ,TerritoryID  ,Category AS VerticalCategory  FROM [DW_CRM].[t_CRM_Accounts]

SELECT AccountGUID AS AccountID ,AddressLine1 ,AddressLine2 ,AddressLine3 ,City , ContactGUID AS ContactID ,ContactID AS ContactNumber ,Country ,CountryValue ,Description ,DonotAllowEMail ,DonotAllowMail ,Email ,Fax ,FirstName ,JobRole ,JobTitle ,LastName ,ManagedCode ,MarketingAudience ,MobilePhone ,PartnerAccountID ,PostalCode ,StateOrProvince ,Status ,StatusCode ,SurveyLanguage, ContactSource FROM [DW_CRM].[t_CRM_Contacts]

SELECT   DetailEngagementType  ,EngagementType  ,MPLId  ,MplPartnerType  ,MPNHeadQuartersId  ,MPNLocationId  ,MPNOrganizationId  ,MPNOrganizationPartnerType  ,MPNSubsidiary  ,PartnerAccountGUID AS PartnerAccountId  ,PartnerAccountID AS PartnerNumber  ,ocpid  FROM [DW_CRM].[t_CRM_PartnerAccounts]
SELECT SalesGeographyRegion ,SalesGroup ,SalesUnit ,Subsidiary ,SalesTerritoryGUID AS TerritoryId FROM DW_CRM.t_CRM_Taxonomy_SalesTerritory where SalesUnit <> 'USA - Federal'
